results.title: Antiproliferative effects of metformin in cellular models of pheochromocytoma.
results.text_hl: Antiproliferative effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in cellular models of @<m>DISEASE_Pheochromocytoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010673 @@@pheochromocytoma@@@.

results.title: Metformin Treatment Induces Different Response in Pheochromocytoma/Paraganglioma Tumour Cells and in Primary Fibroblasts
results.text_hl: Recent studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exhibits antiproliferative activity in many @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@, including @<m>DISEASE_Pheochromocytoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010673 @@@PPGLs@@@.

citations.NLM: Martinelli S, Amore F, Mello T, Mannelli M, Maggi M, Rapizzi E. Metformin Treatment Induces Different Response in Pheochromocytoma/Paraganglioma Tumour Cells and in Primary Fibroblasts Cancers (Basel). 2022 Jul 17;14(14):. PMID: 35884532

results.title: Metformin Suppresses Proliferation and Viability of Rat Pheochromocytoma Cells
results.text_hl: However, the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Pheochromocytoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010673 @@@pheochromocytoma@@@ cells remains unexplored.
